title: Was Sir Elton Hercules John given a name when he was born Reginald Kenneth Dwight? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is the webpage about Elton John that is on Wikipedia. Here is what says on it for you to read. Elton John - Wikipedia It says on it the following: Sir Elton Hercules John CH CBE (born Reginald Kenneth Dwight; 25 March 1947) is an English singer, songwriter, pianist, and composer.
